hooks.command: python3 -c "import json, sys; data=json.load(sys.stdin); path=data.get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path',''); sys.exit(2 if any(p in path for p in ['.env', 'package-lock.json', '.git/']) else 0)"
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.ts$'; then npx prettier --write "$file_path"; fi; }

statusLine.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); CWD=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir // .cwd // \"$(pwd)\""); OUTPUT=""; if [ -n "$FOUNDATION" ]; then OUTPUT+=$(printf "\033[1;32mðŸª %s\033[0m " "$FOUNDATION"); fi; if [ -n "$CWD" ]; then OUTPUT+=$(printf "\033[1;36m%s\033[0m " "$(basename "$CWD")"); if [ -d "$CWD/.git" ] || git -C "$CWD" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then BRANCH=$(git -C "$CWD" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); REMOTE=$(git -C "$CWD" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --abbrev-ref --symbolic-full-name @{u} 2>/dev/null | cut -d"/" -f2-); if [ -n "$BRANCH" ]; then if [ -n "$REMOTE" ] && [ "$REMOTE" != "$BRANCH" ]; then OUTPUT+=$(printf "\033[1;35mðŸŒ± %s:%s\033[0m " "$BRANCH" "$REMOTE"); else OUTPUT+=$(printf "\033[1;35mðŸŒ± %s\033[0m " "$BRANCH"); fi; STATUS=""; git -C "$CWD" --no-optional-locks diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null || STATUS+="Â±"; UNTRACKED=$(git -C "$CWD" --no-optional-locks ls-files --others --exclude-standard 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d " "); [ "$UNTRACKED" -gt 0 ] && STATUS+="?"; [ -n "$STATUS" ] && OUTPUT+=$(printf "\033[1;33m[%s]\033[0m " "$STATUS"); fi; fi; fi; if command -v kubectl &>/dev/null 2>&1; then K8S_CONTEXT=$(kubectl config current-context 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$K8S_CONTEXT" ]; then K8S_NS=$(kubectl config view --minify --output "jsonpath={..namespace}" 2>/dev/null); [ -z "$K8S_NS" ] && K8S_NS="default"; OUTPUT+=$(printf "\033[1;36mâŽˆ %s (%s)\033[0m " "$K8S_CONTEXT" "$K8S_NS"); fi; fi; echo -n "${OUTPUT% }"; echo >&2'
